E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/3/1973
Subject: Progress of Jack Heidemann
Dear Sir,
Jack Heidemann has nothing more to prove at A Reno Silver Sox!
He has an AVG of .395 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/8/1973
Subject: Dave Hilton learns new position
Dave Hilton has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
